OFFICE MEMORANDUM

Subject: Procedures for disseminating threat information.

‘The procedure for disseminating threat information by the DG, BCAS to
relevant entities, to assist them in conduct of risk assessments, has been outlined
in Para 12.4 of the NCASP. Further details and procedures arc provided as under;

2. The information shared by the DG, BCAS to assist airport-levcl entities in
conducting effective risk assessment shall include, but is not limited to;

i) Guidelines on Threat and Risk Assessment.
ii) Bomb Threats.

iii) Hijack Alerts.

iv) Cyber Threats.

v) Anticipated Law and Order Problem.

vi) Inputs regarding any probable terrorist attack.
vii) Intelligence inputs regarding IEDs attack

viii) Specific threats to Landside.

ix) Likely threat of MANPADS

x) Any other relevant inputs received by the DG, BCAS.

3. Upon receiving threat information from National Intelligence Agencies, the DG
BCAS, shall collate and further disseminate, as deemed appropriate, to concerned
stakeholders and other relevant entitics. This information shall be shared through
secure means as per laid down procedures.
